```{r}
#| label: fig-test
#| include: true
#| fig-cap: "test plot"

# Load necessary library
library(ggplot2)

# Generate sample data
set.seed(123)
data <- data.frame(
  x = rnorm(100),
  y = rnorm(100)
)

# Create scatterplot using ggplot
ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    title = "Scatterplot",
    x = "X-axis",
    y = "Y-axis"
  )

```
